NODE.page:
Authorized Readers: [{listgroup:readers_user}] [{displayInherited:readers_user}]

Authorized Creators: [{listgroup:writers_user}] [{displayInherited:writers_user}]

Authorized Deleters: [{listgroup:deleters_user}] [{displayInherited:deleters_user}] [% if(isGroup($NODE)) { "

Restricted Nodetypes: "; } %]

Restrict Duplicates (identical titles): [% if($$NODE{restrictdupes} == -1) { "parent"; } else{ $$NODE{restrictdupes}?"Yes":"No";} %] [{displayInherted:restrictdups}]

Sql Table: [% if (exists $$NODE{sqltable}) { my $TABLE = getNode $$NODE{sqltable}, 'dbtable'; linkNode $TABLE; } else { "none";} %] [{displayInherited:sqltable}]

Extends Nodetype: [% linkNode ($$NODE{extends_nodetype}) if ($$NODE{extends_nodetype});%]

Relevant pages:
[% my $str; my @pages; push @pages, getPages($NODE); foreach (@pages) { $str .= "

  • " .linkNode ($_); } $str; %]

    Active Maintenances:
    [% my $str; my (@maints) = getNodeWhere ({maintain_nodetype=>getId($NODE)}, getType('maintenance')); return "no maintenance functions" unless @maints; foreach (@maints) {$str .= "

  • ".linkNode ($_); } $str; %]
NODE.title: nodetype display page
